Articles.Content:
![jdxwK7i.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/jdxwK7i.jpg)

Flies pretty good, has 2 .50 cal turrets, 2 hidden vulcans, and 2 snake-eye bombs

Uses Kerbal Aircraft Expansion, BD armory, and Tweakscale.
Does it fly in aircraft carrier transport mode or do the wings fold down?

> 
> Does it fly in aircraft carrier transport mode or do the wings fold down?

 Yeah, they do fold down.
